attributes.action: Open vote of no confidence in Jeremy Corbyn to all members of Labour Party
attributes.additional_details: I understand that a parliamentary petition may not be directly responsible for changing the Labour Party's policies but I do believe this is the best way of getting the issue heard quickly, before it's too late.
attributes.background: 251,417 out of 422,871 voters chose Jeremy Corbyn to lead the Labour Party, yet a vote of no confidence will be decided by a handful of MPs. I would like to raise the issue that if Mr Corbyn is to be forced out, it should be by ALL the people, not just a few. Let true democracy decide his future.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Labour party.
